name: @ggedde/spry-css
description: A simple and customizable CSS Toolkit while being as lightweight as possible
author: ggedde

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/sass --style=compressed ./spry.scss | node_modules/.bin/postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --use postcss-combine-media-query -o ./dist/spry.min.css; sass --style=compressed ./spry.scss | node_modules/.bin/postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --use postcss-combine-media-query -o ./docs/spry.min.css; gzip -c ./dist/spry.min.css > ./dist/spry.min.css.gz
